code: import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';const initialState={currentUser:null};const userSlice=createSlice({name:'user',initialState,reducers:{setCurrentUser:(state,action)=>{return{...state,currentUser:action.payload};}}});export const userReducer=userSlice.reducer;export const{setCurrentUser}=userSlice.actions;export const selectCurrentUser=state=>{return state.user.currentUser;};
